mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment( comment_id, artwork_id, member_id, comment_content, c_upload_date, c_update_date, member_username ) VALUES( DEFAULT, #{artworkId}, #{memberId}, #{commentContent}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{memberUsername} )
mapper.select: SELECT c.member_username, c.c_upload_date, c.comment_content, m.member_image FROM comment c INNER JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.member_id WHERE c.artwork_id = #{artworkId} ORDER BY c.c_upload_date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET comment_content = #{commentContent}, c_update_date = NOW() WHERE comment_id = #{commentId}
